code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{TextField,Button,Box}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TodoForm(_ref){let{addTodo}=_ref;const[task,setTask]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!task)return;addTodo(task);setTask('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{component:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,sx:{display:'flex',gap:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{variant:"outlined",label:"Add a new task",value:task,onChange:e=>setTask(e.target.value),fullWidth:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",type:"submit",children:"Add"})]});}export default TodoForm;
